src_original: bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto (ŚsP_II-1_34)
tgt_original: 空、菩薩、前際，是諸法無二無別。

src_original: 'nyan madhyam iti hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra yā ca samādhyasattā yā ca samādhiśūnyatā
tgt_original: 以是因緣故，舍利弗！ 菩薩前際不可得。 「復次，舍利弗！

src_original: dhāraṇīmukhāsattayāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
tgt_original: 以是因緣故，舍利弗！ 菩薩前際不可得。 「復次，舍利弗！

src_original: dhāraṇīmukhaśūnyatayā pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,  dhāraṇīmukhaviviktatayā pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
tgt_original: 一切三昧門、一切陀羅尼門無有故，菩薩前際不可得； 三昧門、陀羅尼門空故、離故、性無故，菩薩前際不可得。

src_original: na hi śūnyatāyāṃ mārgākārajñatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. sarvākārajñatā sarvākārajñatayā śūnyā. tat kasya hetoḥ?  na hi śūnyatāyāṃ sarvākārajñatā saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. śrāvakayānaṃ śrāvakayānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?  na hi śūnyatāyāṃ śrāvakayānaṃ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. pratyekabuddhayānaṃ pratyekabuddhayānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?  na hi śūnyatāyāṃ pratyekabuddhayānaṃ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. buddhayānaṃ buddhayānena śūnyam. tat kasya hetoḥ?  na hi śūnyatāyāṃ buddhayānaṃ saṃvidyate na bodhisattvaḥ. śrāvakaḥ śrāvakena śūnyaḥ. tat (ŚsP_II-1_73)
tgt_original: 一切智、一切智相空，道種智、道種智相空，一切種智、一切種智相空； 聲聞乘、聲聞乘相空，辟支佛乘、辟支佛乘相空，佛乘、佛乘相空； 聲聞人、聲聞人相空，辟支佛、辟支佛相空，佛、佛相空。 空中色不可得，受、想、行、識不可得。

src_original: vedanā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  saṃjñā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  saṃskārā bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  vijñānaṃ bodhisattva ity evam api na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
tgt_original: 色是菩薩，是亦不可得； 受、想、行、識是菩薩，是亦不可得。

src_original: yad apy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra evam āha kena kāraṇena vadasi,
tgt_original: 「如舍利弗言：

src_original: evam āha sarveṇa sarvaṃ bodhisattvam anupalambhamānaḥ katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām evaṃ vadiṣyāmy anuśāsiṣyāmīti.
tgt_original: 『何因緣故，於一切種、一切處，菩薩不可得，當教何等菩薩般若波羅蜜？

src_original: rūpam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra rūpe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
tgt_original: 』舍利弗！ 色，色中不可得；

src_original: rūpaṃ vedanāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
tgt_original: 色，受中不可得。

src_original: vedanā vedanāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
tgt_original: 受，受中不可得；

src_original: vedanā rūpe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
tgt_original: 受，色中不可得；

src_original: rūpavedanā saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
tgt_original: 受，想中不可得。

src_original: saṃjñā saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
tgt_original: 想，想中不可得；

src_original: saṃjñā rūpavedanayo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  rūpavedanāsaṃjñā saṃskāreṣu na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
tgt_original: 想，色、受中不可得； 想，行中不可得。

src_original: saṃskārāḥ saṃskāreṣu na saṃvidyante nopalabhyate,
tgt_original: 行，行中不可得；

src_original: saṃskārā rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsu na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā vijñāne na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
tgt_original: 行，色、受、想中不可得；

src_original: vijñānaṃ vijñāne na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  vijñānaṃ rūpavedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāreṣu na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.
tgt_original: 行，識中不可得。 識，識中不可得，識，色、受、想、行中不可得。

src_original: cakṣur āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra cakṣuṣi na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
tgt_original: 舍利弗！ 眼，眼中不可得；

src_original: cakṣuḥ śrotre na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
tgt_original: 眼，耳中不可得。

src_original: śrotraṃ śrotre na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  śrotraṃ cakṣuṣi na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
tgt_original: 耳，耳中不可得； 耳，眼中不可得；

src_original: cakṣuḥ śrotraś ca ghrāṇe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
tgt_original: 耳，鼻中不可得。

src_original: ghrāṇaṃ ghrāṇe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
tgt_original: 鼻，鼻中不可得；

src_original: ghrānaṃ cakṣuḥśrotrayo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇaṃ jihvāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
tgt_original: 鼻，眼、耳中不可得； 鼻，舌中不可得。

src_original: jihvā jihvāyāṃ na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
tgt_original: 舌，舌中不可得；

src_original: jihvā cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇeṣu na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvāḥ kāye na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
tgt_original: 舌，眼、耳、鼻中不可得； 舌，身中不可得。

src_original: kāyaḥ kāye na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
tgt_original: 身，身中不可得；

src_original: kāyaś cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvāsu na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyā manasi na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
tgt_original: 身，眼、耳、鼻、舌中不可得； 身，意中不可得。

src_original: mano manasi na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  manaś cakṣuḥśrotraghrāṇajihvākāyeṣu na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate.  rūpaṃ rūpe na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
tgt_original: 意，意中不可得；

src_original: ghrāṇavijñānaṃ ghrāṇavijñāne na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  ghrāṇavijñānaṃ cakṣurvijñānaśrotravijñānayo na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  cakṣurvijñānaśrotravijñānaghrāṇavijñānāni jihvāvijñāne na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
tgt_original: 鼻，鼻中不可得； 鼻，眼、耳中不可得； 鼻，舌中不可得。

src_original: jihvāvijñānaṃ jihvāvijñāne na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
tgt_original: 舌，舌中不可得；

src_original: jihvāvijñānaṃ cakṣurvijñānaśrotravijñānaghrāṇavijñāneṣu na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,  cakṣurvijñānaśrotravijñānaghrāṇavijñānajihvāvijñānāni kāyavijñāne na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante,
tgt_original: 舌，眼、耳、鼻中不可得； 舌，身中不可得。

src_original: kāyavijñānaṃ kāyavijñāne na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
tgt_original: 身，身中不可得；

src_original: kāyavijñānaṃ cakṣurvijñānaśrotravijñānaghrāṇavijñānajihvāvijñāneṣu na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
tgt_original: 身，眼、耳、鼻、舌中不可得；

src_original: yac ca śūnyaṃ na tan nāma tenocyate nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.  punar aparam āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta dānapāramitā na ca nāmni dānapāramitā na ca dānapāramitāyāṃ nāma. tat kasya  tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca dānapāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
tgt_original: 若空，則非菩薩。

src_original: tasmān nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
tgt_original: 以是因緣故，舍利弗！ 菩薩但有假名。

src_original: tasmān nāmadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.  namadheyamātram etad yad uta vīryapāramitā na ca nāmni vīryapāramitā na ca vīryapāramitāyāṃ nāma. tat kasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 檀波羅蜜但有名字；

src_original: tathā hi yac ca nāma yā ca vīryapāramitā ubhayam etan na saṃvidyate nopalabhyate,
tgt_original: 名字中非有檀波羅蜜，檀波羅蜜中非有名字。

src_original: tasmān namadheyamātram etad yad uta bodhisattva iti.
tgt_original: 以是因緣故，菩薩但有假名。

src_original: namadheyamātram etad yad uta prajñāpāramitā na ca nāmni prajñāpāramitā na ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ nāma. tat kasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 般若波羅蜜但有名字； 名字中無有般若波羅蜜，般若波羅蜜中無有名字。

src_original: na hy āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra vīryapāramitāsattāyāṃ vīryapāramitāśūnyatāyāṃ vīryapāramitāviviktatāyāṃ  upalabhyate. na cānyā vīryapāramitāsattānyā vīryapāramitāśūnyatānyā vīryapāramitāviviktatānyā
tgt_original: 空中前際不可得、後際不可得、中際不可得；

src_original: vīryapāramitāsvabhāvatānyo bodhisattvo 'nyaḥ pūrvānto 'nyo 'parānto 'nyan madhyam
tgt_original: 空不異菩薩，菩薩不異前際。

src_original: yā ca vīryapāramitāviviktatā yā ca vīryapāramitāsvabhāvatā yaś ca bodhisattvo yaś  ca pūrvānto yaś cāparānto yac ca madhyaṃ sarvam etad advayam advaidhīkāram.
tgt_original: 空、菩薩、前際，是諸法無二無別。

src_original: dhyānapāramitāsattayāyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
tgt_original: 以是因緣故，舍利弗！ 菩薩前際不可得。 「舍利弗！

src_original: dhyānapāramitāśūnyatayā pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,  pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,  dhyānapāramitāsvabhāvatayā pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
tgt_original: 檀波羅蜜空故，檀波羅蜜離故，檀波羅蜜性無故，菩薩前際不可得；

src_original: dhyānapāramitāviviktatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. dhyānapāramitāsvabhāvatayā madhyato bodhisattvo nopaiti. tat kasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 般若波羅蜜空故，般若波羅蜜離故，般若波羅蜜性無故，菩薩前際不可得。 何以故？
